April 10, 2011 D National Youth Brass Band Championships of Great Britain - Advanced Section
National Youth Brass Band Championships - Advanced Section 20 Set Test and Own Choice National Youth Brass Band Championships of Great Britain national-youth-brass-band-championships--857
Psalms and Alleluias
Royal Northern College of Music (Haden Freeman Concert Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Psalms and Alleluias (Philip Wilby) and Own Choice Programme, 20 minutes playing time.
Best Instrumentalist: Charlie Hodge (Xylophone) - Camborne Youth Brian Hicks Memorial Trophy: Nigel Birch (Lions Youth)
April 11, 2011, 6:38 p.m. Nov. 5, 2015, 1:39 p.m.
1 Camborne Junior Contesting Alan Pope
2 Lions Youth Brass Nigel Birch
3 Gloucestershire Youth Band Philip Harper
4 St. Helens Youth Brass Band Mark Bousie
5 Oldham Music Centre Jonathan Leedale
5 Youth Brass 2000 Chris Jeans
